targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "success_95th_resp_time"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  COUNT(value) AS "reqs_per_sec"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT 
	time,
	SUM(vus) as vus
FROM (
	SELECT
	  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
	  tags->>'replicaId' as "instance",
	  MAX(value) AS "vus"
	FROM
	  samples
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(ts)
    AND metric = 'vus'
	  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
	GROUP BY 1, 2
) AS max_vus_per_instance
group by 1
ORDER BY 1 asc

SELECT
  1 AS "time",
  COUNT(value)
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (tags->>'status')::int >= 400
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  1 AS "time",
  SUM(value)
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  metric = 'http_reqs'
  AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1000
  AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1399
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.description: The 95th percentile response time of the target system, with success responses separated from error responses.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "successful"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (tags->>'status')::integer < 400
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "failed"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (tags->>'status')::integer >= 400
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Request duration (95th percentile)

panels.description: Request rate, with successful responses separated from failed ones.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  COUNT(value) AS "reqs_per_sec"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT 
	time,
	SUM(vus) as vus
FROM (
	SELECT
	  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
	  tags->>'replicaId' as "instance",
	  MAX(value) AS "vus"
	FROM
	  samples
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(ts)
    AND metric = 'vus'
	  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
	GROUP BY 1, 2
) AS max_vus_per_instance
group by 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Throughput

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  SUM(CASE WHEN (tags->>'status')::int >= 400 THEN value ELSE 0 END)::real / SUM(value)::real * 100.0 AS "http_failure_rate"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'http_reqs'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  CASE WHEN COUNT(value) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::real / COUNT(value)::real * 100.0 ELSE 0 END AS "check_failure_rate"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'checks'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  CASE WHEN "tags" IS NULL THEN "metric" ELSE "metric" || '{' || (SELECT key || ':' || value FROM jsonb_each_text("tags")) || '}' END,
  "threshold",
  CASE WHEN "last_failed" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS pass_fail
FROM
  thresholds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 3 ASC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  tags->>'check' AS "check",
  SUM(CASE WHEN value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "successful",
  SUM(CASE WHEN value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "failed",
  CASE WHEN COUNT(value) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::real / COUNT(value)::real * 100.0 ELSE 0 END AS "failure_rate"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'checks'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 4 DESC
LIMIT 100

value.title: Click to open $__cell in new tab

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  tags->>'url' AS "URL",
  tags->>'method' AS "method",
  CASE 
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1000 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1099 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (General)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1101 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (DNS no such host)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1110 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (DNS blacklisted IP)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1100 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1199 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (DNS)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1211 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP connection timeout)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1212 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP connection refused)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1213 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP connection error)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1200 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1299 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TCP)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int = 1311 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TLS cert not matching hostname)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1300 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1399 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (TLS)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int >= 1600 AND (tags->>'error_code')::int <= 1699 THEN tags->>'error_code' || ' (HTTP/2)'
    WHEN (tags->>'status')::int = 0 THEN tags->>'error_code'
    ELSE tags->>'status'
  END AS "status",
  COUNT(*) AS count,
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "95th",
  percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "99th",
  MAX(value) AS "max"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
ORDER BY 6 DESC
LIMIT 100

panels.description: Breakdown of web vitals while performing load test

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "lcp (Largest Contentful Paint)"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_web_vital_lcp'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "inp (Interaction to Next Paint)"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_web_vital_inp'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "cls (Cumulative Layout Shift)"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_web_vital_cls'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "fid (First Input Delay)"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_web_vital_fid'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "fcp (First Contentful Paint)"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_web_vital_fcp'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "ttfb (Time To First Byte)"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_web_vital_ttfb'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Web Vitals (95th percentile)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  COUNT(value) AS "poor_vitals_per_sec"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND starts_with(metric, 'browser_web_vital_')
  AND tags->>'rating' = 'poor'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  COUNT(value) AS "all_requests"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

  AND metric = 'data_received'

targets.rawSql:

FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'iteration_duration'
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('seconds', ts) AS "time",
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY value) AS "failed"
FROM
  samples
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
  AND metric = 'browser_http_req_duration'
  AND (tags->>'status')::integer >= 400
  AND (CASE WHEN $testid != '<all>' THEN tags->>'testid' = $testid ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Iteration duration (95th percentile)

list.label: Test ID
list.name: testid
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT tags->>'testid' AS "id" FROM samples WHERE metric = 'vus';

title: Open Source Browser Load Testing Stack
